definition: frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
fixed framework (idiom); restriction of social conventions and taboos (usually derogatory)/regulations and restrictions
fixed framework (idiom); restriction of social conventions and taboos (usually derogatory)/regulations and restrictions
rectangular frame used to view a scene (made out of cardboard etc, or formed by the thumbs and forefingers)/viewfinder/viewing frame

sentences.english: At a high speed, a car is more stable if it uses slightly wider rims.
sentences.chinese: 在高速行駛時，汽車是如果它使用更穩定略寬框。

sentences.english: Hovering over the Chat Frame and using the mouse wheel will allow players to scroll through chat text.
sentences.chinese: ◦鼠標懸停在聊天框可以用鼠標滾輪捲動聊天記錄了。

sentences.english: Enter POL in the media code box and click the Verify button.
sentences.chinese: 輸入油料在媒體上的代碼框，並點擊驗證按鈕。

sentences.english: The frame sets off your painting very well.
sentences.chinese: 這個框把你的畫陪襯得很美。

sentences.english: My wire-rim glasses and semi-fashionable haircut?
sentences.chinese: 我的金絲框眼鏡和還算時尚的髮式？

sentences.english: This machine is the specialized equipment for spreading hot butyl sealant uniformly onto the two sides of the aluminum spacing frame.
sentences.chinese: 該機是在鋁間隔框兩側均勻塗丁基熱熔膠的專用設備。

sentences.english: If you find the popup distracting, you can move the slider to Never.
sentences.chinese: 如果你發現彈出框影響了你，你可以讓其消失不再見。

sentences.english: For example, the drop-down arrow in a combo box control is a button.
sentences.chinese: 例如，組合框控件中的下拉箭頭就是一個按鈕。

sentences.english: I decided it was time to tick the cupping box on my list.
sentences.chinese: 我決定是時候滴答作響拔罐框我的名單上。

sentences.english: And for now, you can also use the search box we’ve provided.
sentences.chinese: 而現在呢，你也可以使用我們提供的搜索框。

sentences.english: Toshio leaned down to look at photos in a plastic album half-buried in the mud before realizing they were of another family.
sentences.chinese: 彎下腰看一個半埋在泥裏的塑料照相框。

sentences.english: We use diamond-shaped boxes for questions.
sentences.chinese: 所提的問題填在菱形框裏。

sentences.english: Rectangular box like a ring-shaped runway, and sports together.
sentences.chinese: 矩形的框就象是環形的跑道，與體育聯繫在一起。

sentences.english: When the client receives the suggestion list, a pop-up message box displays.
sentences.chinese: 當客戶端收到推薦列表時，將會顯示一個彈出信息框。

sentences.english: The open reading frame encodes a protein of 574 aa.
sentences.chinese: 開放閱讀框編碼574個氨基酸。

sentences.english: The box-and-line diagram of the architecture leaves a lot of room for interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 體系結構的框線圖留下了大量有待解釋的空間。

definition: black frame (around a funerary portrait or obituary)
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)
blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
form (used in programming languages such as Visual Basic and Delphi to create a GUI window)
checked pattern/square box character (in Chinese text) indicating illegible character
